line_1: That in her heart the Christian she reveres,
line_2: And while she seems to scorn him, only fears.

line_1: Aw'd by the view, my soul reveres
line_2: The Great FIRST CAUSE that bade the spheres

line_1: Nor yet th' obdurate king the God reveres,
A mystery he so much reveres,
The grand Destroyer greedy Time reveres
